title: After setting finger print and pin I get message "pin required after device restarts" and a mailbox
content: After setting finger print and pin I get message "pin required after device restarts" and a mailbox number to call (on my new Pixel 3) it is locked and will not accept the set-up pin - did not match any answers in Pixel Phone Help.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
